data.title: Nemetschek SE: Investor Relations & Financial Insights | seat11a
data.meta_description: Explore Nemetschek SE's financial insights with seat11a. Get concise video presentations, elevator pitches, and updates from the CEO and CFO. Dive in now.
data.text:
The Nemetschek Group: Pioneering Digital Transformation

The Nemetschek Group is a pioneer for digital transformation in the AEC/O industry.

With its intelligent software solutions, it covers the entire lifecycle of building and infrastructure projects and guides its customers into the future of digitalization.

Impacting Global Building Processes

As one of the leading corporate groups worldwide, the Nemetschek Group increases quality in the building process and improves the digital workflow of all those involved in the building process. This makes it possible to design, build and manage buildings with greater efficiency, sustainability and environmental compatibility in terms of resources.

Adherence to Open Standards

The focus is on the use of open standards (OPEN BIM).

Expansive Digital Solutions Portfolio

The portfolio also includes digital solutions for visualization, 3D modeling and animation.

Nemetschek Groupâ€™s Global Impact and Usage

The innovative products of the 15 brands of the Nemetschek Group in the four customer-oriented segments are used by approximately six million users worldwide.

Historical Background and Financial Overview

Foundation and Growth

Founded by Prof. Georg Nemetschek in 1963, the Nemetschek Group today employs more than 3,000 experts.

Financial Performance

Publicly listed since 1999 and quoted on the MDAX and TecDAX, the company achieved revenue amounting to EUR 596.9 million and an EBITDA of EUR 172.3 million in 2020.
